document_data.name: Simple's Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Simple's Street''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved street in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This street opened south off of the courtyard [[Virgin's Square]], then ran from east to west. At its western end the street terminated on [[Snail Street]], while its eastern end terminated on the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]].

Notable Buildings.Bowels of the Earth: a dive bar on the corner of Simple's Street and Snail Street.<ref><ref>
